author: inphi
content:
EIP-4844 Devnet Update: A publicly available execution client JSON-RPC is now available at https://eip-4844.optimism.io. You no longer have to run your own node to interact with the network.
The devnet user guide contains some more info more publicly available endpoints https://hackmd.io/@inphi/SJMXL1P6c#Endpoints.

author: kanagwa
content: Hi, I wonder if there was progress with the creation of a Faucet for the network. From the last breakout notes seems Carlos & Georgios were the stakeholders of that initiative. Happy to help or take on that task

author: kanagwa
content: My plan is to fork the pradigm MutiFaucet (https://github.com/Anish-Agnihotri/MultiFaucet) and deploy the contracts and front-end only for the eip4844 devnet for now.

author: kanagwa
content: <@159152274659082240> I'll send you a pm with my address to get some test ETH.

author: bridge-bot
content:

Thanks a ton for looking into this! Feel free to pm me for some dank ETH.
